main event: Observation of three yellowish lights in the sky over Hugo, Colorado on December 2, 1956.
interesting points: The lights appeared to graduate in size and were stationary before fading out., The lights moved from east to west over a period of five minutes., The sighting was reported to the Colorado Springs GOC., The report suggests a possibility of the lights being a balloon or aircraft., A detailed investigation was conducted with several conclusions mentioned.
sighted object: three yellowish lights in the sky
witness description: No specific witnesses were mentioned in the report.
